mapper.select: SELECT sa_img, b_no, b_title, b_id, dbday, b_hit, b_delete, num FROM (SELECT b_no, b_title, b_id, To_char(b_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')as dbday, b_sano , b_hit, b_delete, rownum as num FROM (SELECT b_no, b_title, b_id, b_date, b_hit, b_delete, b_sano FROM p_board)) b LEFT OUTER JOIN b_Word w ON b.b_sano=w.sa_no WHERE b_delete='y' AND num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY b_no DESC
